title: When you regret your choice of name. . . .

replies.body: Anytime Garen's mechanics are involved.

AT FIRST I WAS LIKE
https://adrianowong.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/garen_splash.jpg

BUT THEN I SAW THE VILLANY!!!
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/691/682/e25.jpg
i regret playing soraka with my name
My name typically leaves me getting flamed for when I actually do bad. Never like "oh hes not that bad" whnever i do well lol
I only regret my choices when one of my friends calls me 'lusty sea wench.' :|

> [{quoted}](name=Weird Asian Porn,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TwjEcQrq,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-26T17:19:20.946+0000)

hehe yeh it is...oh.
{{champion:161}}

Yeah what idiot would name themselves like that. That's worse than naming after a champion.
.....Or a specific build path for a champion.
*cries*

My summoner name on my other account, EkkoFroffles, got me plenty of stupid responses. People would ask why I wasn't playing Ekko, and mock me for naming myself after a champion.

On this account, however, I thankfully came up with something that goes unnoticed by seemingly everyone.
{{champion:223}}
{{champion:223}} + {{champion:32}} (my two favorite champions) + hat, because of Tahm's top hat.

> [{quoted}](name=TahmumuhaT,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TwjEcQrq,comment-id=0018,timestamp=2015-10-27T00:27:59.955+0000)
>
> My summoner name on my other account, EkkoFroffles, got me plenty of stupid responses. People would ask why I wasn't playing Ekko, and mock me for naming myself after a champion.
> 
> On this account, however, I thankfully came up with something that goes unnoticed by seemingly everyone.

ew. a palindrome lol
Not actually a palindrome. I messed it up. But it does still have a symmetry to it that I find immensely satisfying. Tah on one end, Hat on the other, and Mumu in the middle.

> [{quoted}](name=TahmumuhaT,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TwjEcQrq,comment-id=001800010000,timestamp=2015-10-28T18:22:33.038+0000)

lol I am so dumb. didn't even notice! I also find your name particularly visually satisfying.

When people call you "Melon."

And continue to call you a fruit all game.
Orange you said you picked that name, then?
"Is that 5 l's, or is there an i in there to fuck us up?"
there is actually 6 I's in that image.
O.O Oh
yeah embertine is kinda a shit name in league kappa :^)
T^T
Anything with rank or angelic name is awesome. Sort of like mine.
I agree with this statement.
I regret nothing (especially the few times I'm on a rampage or godlike so "ChewbaccasRear is on a Rampage" "ChewbaccasRear is Godlike" appears on the screen)
They ask me if I like cats -_-
Meow {{summoner:31}}

Everytime a Shyvanna ganks me.

Dammit.

People call me jugs alot
its k sometimes
I'm only allowed to play champions with paws or I get "LOL U DUN HAVE NO PAWS!"
If your name was Quick Claw, you would always strike first.

To this day almost no one notices my name or what it means.

:(

> [{quoted}](name=3SheetsTotheWind,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TwjEcQrq,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-10-26T21:06:57.338+0000)
>
> To this day almost no one notices my name or what it means.
> 
> :(

It's a sailing term for being crazy and out of control right?

It's a sailing term, iirc.

Just looked it up.  Yeah, it's about sailing, and also drunkenness.

I see you there, {{champion:79}}.

Aye, ye figured it out.  Nice work, lad.

;)

It doesn't refer to the sails themselves but to the ropes that tie them back to the yard arms.  If you've got three sheets to the wind the ship will lurch unsteadily whIle the sails whip around making the ship appear drunk.
Keep scrolling, no regrets to see here
I am actually curious now of what makes a poro promiscuous.
Mainly it was just a catchy and fun name. It also work since the second meaning of promiscuous mean "brought together without reason or order" which can kind of be thought as a reference to ARAM

I regret my name.

T ^ T
Pretty good post, but is it the best on the Citadel?

that's not as bad as what i usually get
When i play riven: Boxbox wannabe
When i play shaco: For a shaco main you aren't that good.  Well guess what!  I am not a shaco main and I made this name in 2011 for my minecraft username and started playing league in 2013.  
And sometimes i get the occasional: that's alot of boxes or what do you have in those boxes?
